meanings.definition: The quality or state of being promiscuous.
meanings.sent1: Her promiscuousnesses made it difficult for her to maintain a committed relationship.
meanings.sent2: The promiscuousnesses of the partygoers shocked the conservative town.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuousnesses of the colors in the painting created a chaotic yet intriguing effect.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuousnesses of the ingredients in the dish resulted in a unique and flavorful combination.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuousnesses of the music genres in the festival lineup catered to a diverse audience.

meanings.definition: The practice of having casual sexual relations frequently with different partners.
meanings.sent1: His promiscuousnesses led to complications in his personal life.
meanings.sent2: Promiscuousnesses can sometimes lead to health risks if proper precautions are not taken.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuousnesses of the characters in the novel added a layer of drama to the storyline.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuousnesses of the bees in the garden resulted in cross-pollination of various flowers.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuousnesses of the students during spring break raised concerns among the school staff.

meanings.definition: The tendency to mix or mingle without discrimination.
meanings.sent1: The promiscuousnesses of flavors in the dish created a unique taste experience.
meanings.sent2: His promiscuousnesses in social circles made him a well-known figure in town.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuousnesses of the dog at the park led to playful interactions with all other pets.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuousnesses of ideas in the brainstorming session resulted in a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuousnesses of scents in the garden attracted a variety of butterflies and bees.
